name: weibo2wp plugin
author: Yuan Zhao

sections.description: The goal of this plugin is to help people Synchronize their Weibo( which is a very popular light blog in China) to WP
sections.installation:
1. Download the plugin to your computer.
  2. Unzip the file.
  3. Upload the unzipped plugin folder to your WordPress directory: wp-content/plugins.
  4. Activate the plugin from the Plugins menu at WordPress admin.
  5. After active successfully, You will see weibo2wp Plugin admin pannel on the left menu bar.

* You have to apply for QQ Connect Client and change it at weibo2wp.php. To apply: http://connect.qq.com
sections.changelog:
